subject: College Athletics
Softball
lead_paragraph: Hofstra’s Olivia Galati tied an N.C.A.A. Division I record by pitching her fifth career perfect game, and the Pride beat James Madison to advance to the Colonial Athletic Association championship.
snippet: Hofstra’s Olivia Galati tied an N.C.A.A. Division I record by pitching her fifth career perfect game, and the Pride beat James Madison to advance to the Colonial Athletic Association championship.
